official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to elect the option of covering substance abuse treatment services under the medicaid program.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit States to cover substance abuse treatment services for Medicaid-eligible individuals who desire to rid themselves of substance abuse problems.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to elect the option of covering substance abuse treatment services under the medicaid program.
